channel.title: How to make a basic .bat file for client.java and server.java
channel.description:
Just wondering how I can make a simple .bat file in order to run a client and server! Is it the files named client.java and server.java I must run in a .bat file?
Thanks for answers! :D

item.title: How to make a basic .bat file for client.java and server.java
item.dc:creator: @Ebbe Ebbe
item.source: How to make a basic .bat file for client.java and server.java

item.title: How to make a basic .bat file for client.java and server.java
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

First:

This can get more complex than this, if you use a JAR or your class file isn’t located within the directory of the batch script or if you want to use arguments.

Second: You’re probably correct, you need to execute your class which contains your void main(…) function.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a basic .bat file for client.java and server.java
